title: A Multi-Level Computational Model of Macro-Consciousness with Self-Organizing Inter-Cluster Networks, Predictive Adaptation, and Reproducible Python Simulations
description: Code and data for the article 'A Multi-Level Computational Model of Macro-Consciousness with Self-Organizing Inter-Cluster Networks, Predictive Adaptation, and Reproducible Python Simulations'. The software is released under the MIT license. The accompanying article (if separately published) may be licensed under CC-BY-4.0.
